author: Sorsha_OBrien
text:
How to link something in a post and in a comment?
I searched this up online and went onto the site for help, but the post that was similar to this one was from nine years ago, so I think how to link things here must have changed. 

It said to do \[text\](link) however, I tried this and it didn't work. Proof: \[Our Acts Are Different\]([https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/OurActsAreDifferent](https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/OurActsAreDifferent))

So, how do you do this?
